catalog_info.title: Livestock Population Data - Uttar Pradesh
catalog_info.description: This dataset provides annual livestock population counts at the district level in Uttar Pradesh. It is valuable for AI modeling related to agricultural planning, resource allocation, and predicting livestock market trends.

provenance.ministry: Ministry of Fisheries, Animal Husbandry & Dairying
provenance.jurisdiction: Uttar Pradesh (specifically Varanasi, Meerut, Agra, Ghaziabad)

spatial_temporal.spatial_coverage: Districts of Uttar Pradesh: Varanasi, Meerut, Agra, Ghaziabad
